The Orvis Clearwater Fly Fishing Kit is an excellent choice for a beginner. Orvis is a well-respected brand in the fly fishing industry, and their kits are known for their quality and performance.

Orvis offers a range of instructional materials and classes to help you learn how to use your new kit. Here are a few resources to get you started:

1. **Orvis Fly Fishing 101**: This is a free online course that covers the basics of fly fishing, including gear, casting, and techniques. It's a great resource for beginners, and it's a perfect companion to your new kit.
2. **Orvis Fly Fishing Learning Center**: This is a comprehensive online resource that offers a range of tutorials, videos, and articles on fly fishing techniques, gear, and conservation. You'll find plenty of helpful information to improve your skills and learn new ones.
3. **Orvis Fly Fishing Schools**: Orvis offers fly fishing schools and classes at various locations around the country. These classes are taught by experienced instructors who will help you learn the basics of fly fishing, including casting, knot-tying, and fishing techniques. You can find a school near you on the Orvis website.
4. **Orvis Online Fly Fishing Classes**: Orvis also offers online classes and webinars on various topics, including fly fishing techniques, gear, and conservation. These classes are a great way to learn from experienced instructors from the comfort of your own home.
5. **Orvis Guides and Instructors**: If you want one-on-one instruction or guided fishing trips, Orvis has a network of experienced guides and instructors who can help you improve your skills and catch more fish.

In addition to these resources, the Orvis Clearwater Fly Fishing Kit comes with a comprehensive instruction manual that covers the basics of fly fishing, including gear setup, casting, and techniques.

Remember, practice is key to improving your fly fishing skills. Take advantage of these resources, and don't be afraid to ask questions or seek guidance from more experienced anglers. Good luck, and have fun!
